autumn.lang.compiler

Class DynamicLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • autumn.lang.compiler.DynamicLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class DynamicLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    An instance of this class is a custom class-loader that can load a compiled Autumn program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DynamicLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader parent, CompiledProgram program)
      Sole Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class findClass(java.lang.String name)
      void invokeMain(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method invokes the program's entry-point thereby causing the program to execute.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DynamicLoader

        public DynamicLoader(java.lang.ClassLoader parent,
             CompiledProgram program)
        Sole Constructor.
        Parameters:
        parent - is the parent of the new class-loader.
        program - is the program that is being dynamically loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • findClass

        public java.lang.Class findClass(java.lang.String name)
                          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Overrides:
        findClass in class java.net.URLClassLoader
        Throws:

      • invokeMain

        public void invokeMain(java.lang.String[] args)
                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                       java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                       java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                       java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        This method invokes the program's entry-point thereby causing the program to execute.

        This method does fails quietly, if the program's entry-point was not specified.

        Parameters:
        args - are the arguments to pass to the main method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the main class does not exist.
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the main method does not exist.
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if main method throws an exception.
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the main method cannot be accessed reflectively.
